name: Sword
description: A long sword and a set of mail armor is excellent
starting protection for a new retriever.
However without any ranged attacks caution is required

name: Staff
description: A carved staff with force projection runes provides a
way to dispatch enemies from range, but the cloth armor
is light protection without runic enhancement.

name: Bow & Dagger
description: A bow and a quiver of arrows can solve a number of problems,
but arrows will eventually run out.
Leather armor, quick footwork, and a trusty dagger will
have to be enough to finish the job.
